VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Parkerside?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Parkerside is arc {Vincentshire}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Jackfort?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Jackfort is arc {Vincentshire}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Parkerside to Vincentshire in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Jackfort to Martinstad in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Parkerside and Vincentshire in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Parkerside and Vincentshire is {257}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Martinstad and Vincentshire in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Martinstad and Vincentshire is {153}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Vincentshire?
SC.A: The total flow output from Vincentshire is {468}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Vincentshire?
SC.A: The total flow input by Vincentshire is {510}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 222? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {257} from {Parkerside} to {Vincentshire}, a flow of {225} from {Vincentshire} to {Parkerside}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 101? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {90} from {Vincentshire} to {Jackfort}, a flow of {76} from {Jackfort} to {Vincentshire}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 142 and 165? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {153} from {Vincentshire} to {Martinstad}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Martinstad to Vincentshire or from Martinstad to Jackfort?
NC.A: The flow from {Martinstad} to {Vincentshire} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Martinstad to Vincentshire, from Vincentshire to Martinstad, or from Jackfort to Vincentshire?
NC.A: The flow from {Martinstad} to {Vincentshire} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Martinstad}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Parkerside} and {Vincentshire}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Parkerside, Arc Vincentshire, Arc Jackfort, Arc Martinstad}.
